name: Open Mic #1 ft.Fahaz
description: This edition of Open Mic, we have Fahaz Bazil, a 3rd year Engineering Student at KMEA College of Engineering. Fahaz is a great artist and an integral part of our Music Interest Group and its activities.

name: Open Mic #2 ft.Bibin
description: This edition of Open Mic, we have Bibin Jose, a 3rd year Engineering Student at St. Joseph's College of Engineering and Technology, Palai. Bibin is a wonderful singer as well a great artist.
